item.title: PATRIA X PRO SHOP PISC ets2 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 4, 2025

PATRIA X PRO SHOP PISC ets2 v1.0 ETS2

Explore the roads with the PATRIA X PRO SHOP PISC in ETS2!

If you’re a Euro Truck Simulator 2 enthusiast looking to enhance your experience on the virtual roads, PATRIA X PRO SHOP PISC is your destination! Get ready to take your journeys to the next level with the best mods and customizations for ETS2.

At PATRIA X PRO SHOP PISC, you’ll find a carefully chosen selection of trucks, trailers and accessories that will bring incredible realism and new possibilities to your loads. Imagine yourself behind the wheel of powerful machines, traversing breathtaking landscapes and making challenging deliveries, all with the quality and immersion that only PATRIA X PRO SHOP PISC can offer.

Whether you want to optimize your vehicle’s performance, add authentic details to the interior of the cab or even add a unique touch to your convoy, PATRIA X PRO SHOP PISC has what you need to turn your ETS2 journeys into an unforgettable experience.

Credits: pisc game

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Pack De Rodas MJ3CUSTOM3D v2.8 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 4, 2025

Pack De Rodas MJ3CUSTOM3D v2.8 ETS2

Okay, you’re asking about the “PackDeRodas2.8_MJ3CUSTOM3D”.
This sounds like a wheel pack mod for a simulation game, most likely Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) or American Truck Simulator (ATS), given the context of your previous questions. The “MJ3CUSTOM3D” part likely refers to the creator or team behind the mod, “MJ3 CUSTOM 3D,” who specialize in custom 3D models.

Here’s what that name implies and what you’d typically expect from such a mod:
“Pack de Rodas” (Wheel Pack): This means it’s a collection of various wheels and possibly tires. These packs usually include:
Different rim designs: Chrome, painted, polished aluminum, unique spoke patterns, etc.
Hub covers/nuts: Various styles of wheel hubs and lug nuts for customization.
Tire options: Different sidewall designs or even specific tire brands (though less common in simple wheel packs).
“2.8”: This is likely the version number of the mod. A higher number suggests updates, bug fixes, or new content added since previous versions.
“MJ3CUSTOM3D”: This identifies the mod creator. Searching for “MJ3 CUSTOM 3D” or “MJ3CUSTOM3D” along with “ETS2 wheels” or “ATS wheels” would be the best way to find this specific mod.

Compatibility: Always check if the mod is compatible with your current version of ETS2/ATS. Mod descriptions usually state this.

Credits: mj mods

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Volvo Door Opener Mod v1.2 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 4, 2025

Volvo Door Opener Mod v1.2 ETS2

Real door animations for Volvo trucks! This mod adds functional opening and closing door animations for selected Volvo models for enhanced realism.

Works with Volvo FH 2012 & FH16
Compatible with ETS2 v1.55

item.title: Scania Door Opener Mod v1.2 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 4, 2025

Scania Door Opener Mod v1.2 ETS2

Open your Scania truck doors from inside the game! Enjoy immersive roleplay and realism with fully animated door opening and closing for Scania trucks.
Door animations for Scania S & R series
Controlled via interior buttons or keybinds
Compatible with ETS2 v1.55
